channel.title: How-To Geek
channel.description: We explain technology. Learn more with our articles, reviews, tips, and the best answers to your most pressing tech questions.

item.title: How to Enable the God Folder on Windows 11
item.dc:creator: Aman Kumar
item.description: A one-stop destination for all your Windows settings.
item.content:encoded: If you’ve been using Windows for quite some time now, then you must have heard about God Mode. Don’t worry if you haven’t heard about it before, as I will share everything about Windows God Mode and how it completely changed the way I use my Windows PC.

item.title: These Simple Tweaks Made Edge My Favorite Browser
item.dc:creator: Faisal Rasool
item.description: Let's take the Microsoft out of the Edge browser.
item.content:encoded: Microsoft Edge feels like a billboard more than a browser, which is why I've never used it as my default. Recently, though, I installed Windows on a laptop that was too old to run even a regular browser, so I ended up spending some time with Edge. Turns out, it can be a solid browser with a few tweaks.

item.title: How to Optimize Your CPU Fan Speed for Minimal Noise
item.dc:creator: Goran Damnjanovic
item.description: Tired of sudden fan noise spikes? This unexpected solution may be the answer you've been seeking.
item.content:encoded: About a year ago, I read a comment on Reddit suggesting that instead of dealing with fan curves and sudden noise jumps, you could just run your CPU cooler at a constant speed. Naturally, I had to try this out. Almost a year later, I still run my CPU cooler at a steady RPM.

item.title: Bluesky Is Starting Age Verification in More States
item.dc:creator: Jorge A. Aguilar
item.description: More state residents are going to have to give up an ID or lose features.
item.content:encoded: Bluesky is rolling out age verification in the states of South Dakota and Wyoming for users to access features like messaging and adult content. This is in response to new laws passed in both states that require platforms hosting "harmful" content to verify the ages of their users.

item.title: Ford’s 2025 SUV Lineup Ranked by Reliability
item.dc:creator: Tyler Dupont
item.description: We rank Ford’s 2025 SUVs by reliability so buyers can see which models deliver the most confidence and peace of mind.
item.content:encoded: Ford’s SUVs have built a reputation for combining everyday usability with strong performance, but reliability is often the deciding factor for many buyers. In 2025, Ford’s lineup spans everything from compact crossovers to full-size family haulers, making it one of the most diverse offerings in the segment. With so many choices, knowing which models stand out for long-term dependability is crucial.

item.title: The iPhone Air Is Missing One 5G Feature, and You’d Probably Never Notice
item.dc:creator: Tim Brookes
item.content:encoded: Apple’s brand new slim iPhone is official in the form of the iPhone Air. Pretty much every detail was leaked prior to the big event, including the name. One thing that wasn’t really spoken about, however, was 5G performance.

item.title: Apple Just Made the iPhone 16 a Worse Deal
item.dc:creator: Arol Wright
item.description: Don't buy it. At least not from Apple.
item.content:encoded: The iPhone 17 range was announced yesterday, and it's a pretty different lineup to anything we've seen before. And Apple really wants you to buy it. So much so that it has not only discontinued the iPhone 16 Pro range, but it has also nerfed the regular iPhone 16 phones, too.

item.title: AI Slop Has Shattered My Trust in Google Pixel Phones
item.dc:creator: Bertel King
item.description: Pixels are hardly the only phones with AI, but they're the most aggressive.
item.content:encoded: I have long not been a Google guy, but I still considered Pixel phones to be devices I could easily recommend to others. Google's approach to AI has changed that. I no longer feel comfortable using or recommending these phones.

item.title: Get Half off This Moto Watch Fit Smartwatch
item.dc:creator: Jorge A. Aguilar
item.description: Don't pay high prices for smartwatches when you can get a deal like this.
item.content:encoded: The Motorola Moto Watch Fit has a massive deal, dropping it to just $100 on Amazon. This is a massive discount off its original price of $200, dropping it to 50% for a limited time. This smartwatch is great if you have an Android with Android 12 or up.

item.title: Get This MagSafe Battery Bank for 40% Off Today
item.dc:creator: Jorge A. Aguilar
item.description: Charge your phone on the go with MagSafe or Qi 2, without any cabes.
item.content:encoded: The Baseus MagSafe Portable Charger is currently on sale for just $30 on Amazon. This is a fantastic 40% markdown from its usual price of $50. This compact power bank is also Qi2 certified, offering super-fast 15W wireless charging to keep you powered up all day long.
